text: The quiet breeze drifted through the open window, carrying with it the faint scent of pine and distant rain. As the afternoon sun settled behind the hills, shadows stretched across the room, giving everything a warm, golden glow. A small stack of books lay untouched on the table, waiting for someone to return and continue their stories. Outside, a bird called out, breaking the gentle silence for just a moment. It was the kind of day that felt suspended in time, inviting anyone who noticed to pause, breathe deeply, and appreciate the calm simplicity of the moment.
title: Golden Afternoon
